reviews.text: Thank you sakriye  your indie nice

reviews.author_name: Lasantha Saman Kumara Yatiyana Vidana Arachchige
reviews.text:
All the automatic doors locked at night time. 

No facilities/Shelter for passengers to sit or get protected from wind, Rain while they waiting for train. 

No authorised person at this place to help or guide people; in out of hours.
